tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE luxury_travel_payments (
    payment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL,
    expiry_date DATE NOT NULL,
    security_code INT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    booking_reference UUID
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_travel_bookings (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    travel_destination VARCHAR(100),
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    booking_id INT,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50),
    payment_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (booking_id) REFERENCES luxury_travel_bookings(booking_id)
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_travel_bookings (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    payment_method VARCHAR,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    booking_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    booking_id INT REFERENCES luxury_travel_bookings(booking_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount_paid DECIMAL,
    payment_status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE customer_data (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    email_address VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE customer (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE booking (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    booking_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_id INT,
    booking_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE travel_bookings (
    booking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT REFERENCES luxury_clients(client_id),
    booking_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    departure_city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    destination_city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    booking_id INT REFERENCES travel_bookings(booking_id),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE credit_card_details (
    card_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT REFERENCES luxury_clients(client_id),
    card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL,
    card_holder_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL
);
